paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses the voltage-dependent gating of hERG (KCNH2) potassium channels, focusing on the structural and functional differences compared to Shaker channels. No specific genetic variants in the KCNH2 gene are mentioned.

challenges: The paper did not provide specific genetic variant data for KCNH2.
extraction_metadata.notes: The paper focused on the biophysical properties of hERG channels without discussing specific genetic variants or penetrance data.
